plot: The film describes the feeling lost of a man, even when he's beside his lover. But still, whenever he's alone, he always needs to be cared and loved. And the conflict goes on, he could never escape his sadness.
title: Nguoi dan ong trong be ca
plot_es: The film describes the feeling lost of a man, even when he's beside his lover. But still, whenever he's alone, he always needs to be cared and loved. And the conflict goes on, he could never escape his sadness.
original_name: Nguoi dan ong trong be ca
plot_en: The film describes the feeling lost of a man, even when he's beside his lover. But still, whenever he's alone, he always needs to be cared and loved. And the conflict goes on, he could never escape his sadness.
